spanish: No creí que lo conseguirías.

english: I do not believe in the existence of God.
spanish: No creo en la existencia de Dios.

english: I do not feel like drinking beer tonight.
spanish: Esta noche no tengo ganas de beber cerveza.

english: I don't believe you. You're always lying.
spanish: No te creo, siempre estás mintiendo.

english: I don't care what you do with your money.
spanish: Me da igual lo que hagas con tu dinero.

english: I don't feel like going out this morning.
spanish: Esta mañana no tengo ganas de salir.

english: I don't feel like studying English today.
spanish: No tengo ganas de estudiar inglés hoy.

english: I don't feel much like talking right now.
spanish: Ahora no tengo muchas ganas de hablar.

english: I don't have any feelings for Tom at all.
spanish: No siento nada en absoluto por Tom.

english: I don't have anyone who'd travel with me.
spanish: No tengo a nadie que viaje conmigo.

english: I don't have the strength to keep trying.
spanish: No tengo la fuerza para seguir intentando.

english: I don't have the strength to keep trying.
spanish: No tengo fuerzas para seguir intentándolo.

english: I don't intend to ever talk to Tom again.
spanish: No pienso hablar con Tomás nunca más.

english: I don't know anything about this project.
spanish: No sé nada sobre este proyecto.

english: I don't know exactly when I will be back.
spanish: No sé cuándo volveré exactamente.

english: I don't know how much this motorcycle is.
spanish: No sé cuánto cuesta esta motocicleta.

english: I don't know how to express my gratitude.
spanish: No sé cómo expresar mi gratitud.

english: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
spanish: No sé de qué he tenido tanto miedo.

english: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
spanish: No sé a qué he temido tanto.

english: I don't know what I've been so afraid of.
spanish: No sé de qué he estado tan asustado.

english: I don't know what this symbol stands for.
spanish: No sé qué representa este símbolo.

english: I don't know whether Tom is happy or not.
spanish: No sé si Tom es feliz o no.

english: I don't know whether he is dead or alive.
spanish: No sé si él está vivo o muerto.

english: I don't know whether he will come or not.
spanish: No sé si vendrá o no.

english: I don't know whether he will come or not.
spanish: No sé si va a venir o no.

english: I don't know whether you like her or not.
spanish: No sé si te gusta ella o no.

english: I don't know why Tom didn't just tell us.
spanish: No sé por qué Tom no nos lo dijo.

english: I don't like it, but I will do it anyway.
spanish: No me gusta, pero lo haré de todas formas.

english: I don't like this shirt. Show me another.
spanish: Esta camisa no me gusta. Enséñame otra.

english: I don't like to travel with large groups.
spanish: No me gusta viajar con grupos grandes.

english: I don't like to wear shoes without socks.
spanish: No me gusta usar calzado sin calcetines.

english: I don't really like talking to strangers.
spanish: La verdad es que no me gusta hablar con extraños.

english: I don't think I'm needed here any longer.
spanish: No creo que se me necesite más aquí.

english: I don't think anyone noticed what we did.
spanish: No creo que nadie notara lo que hicimos.

english: I don't think children should drink beer.
spanish: No creo que los niños deberían tomar cerveza.

english: I don't think it's going to happen today.
spanish: No creo que vaya a suceder hoy.

english: I don't think she takes after her mother.
spanish: No encuentro que ella se parezca a su madre.

english: I don't think she will come back by five.
spanish: No creo que ella esté de vuelta para las cinco.

english: I don't think that it will rain tomorrow.
spanish: No creo que llueva mañana.

english: I don't understand Dutch. It's difficult.
spanish: No sé holandés. Es difícil.

english: I don't understand a thing you're saying.
spanish: No entiendo nada de lo que estás diciendo.

spanish: No entiendo nada de lo que dices.

english: I don't want to resign my job at present.
spanish: No quiero dimitir de mi trabajo de momento.

english: I don't want you to tell this to anybody.
spanish: No quiero que le cuentes esto a nadie.

english: I enjoyed myself at the party last night.
spanish: La pasé bien anoche en la fiesta.

english: I entered someone else's room by mistake.
spanish: Entré por error a la pieza de otro.

english: I failed the test because I didn't study.
spanish: Reprobé el examen por no estudiar.

english: I feel dizzy. I think I'm going to faint.
spanish: Me siento mareado. Creo que me voy a desmayar.

english: I feel like I've already seen this movie.
spanish: Tengo la sensación de haber visto ya la película.

english: I feel more comfortable behind the wheel.
spanish: Me siento más cómodo conduciendo.

english: I fell asleep before my father came home.
spanish: Me quedé dormida antes de que mi padre llegara a la casa.
